short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to look up NAICS codes for businesses in the United States, Canada, and Mexico.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Samsearch NAICS Code Lookup Tool is a convenient resource to help businesses, researchers, and government contractors in identifying the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) codes. This tool streamlines the process of finding the appropriate industry codes that categorize business establishments based on their primary economic activity, ensuring compliance with various regulatory and reporting requirements. It is especially valuable for businesses engaged in government contracting, where precise NAICS code identification is essential for eligibility and reporting purposes.

With this tool, users can easily search for specific industries such as "hotel," "sports," or "doctors," and relevant NAICS codes will be displayed. Conversely, if users have a NAICS code and want to determine the industry it corresponds to, they can simply input the code (e.g., "621111," "236115"), and the associated industry will be promptly displayed. This Chrome extension simplifies NAICS code lookup, facilitating efficient navigation of industry classifications.
